file_content.text: [The energy shield has been deactivated.]
[You shut down the energy shield protecting the Flesh Raider command base.]
Hmm. You must be the Padawan who slaughters my people.
Your misguided attacks change nothing. Your time is over.
Master Orgus is looking for you, Bengel.
You must be Bengel Morr.
Orgus won't find me. I'll find him.
My Master is invading your command base right now. It's over, Bengel.
That's not true.
He won't find what he's looking for. I'm not there.
So that's your face? I see why you wear a hood, Bengel.
Hello, ugly.
Orgus's taste in Padawans has grown weak--just as he has.
You executed my apprentice Callef. I can feel his death on you.
I spent years training him. He was a good man, a principled man. Proud of yourself?
I didn't want to kill the man, but he left me no choice.
Pride is not a factor.
There's always a choice. You should've surrendered to the inevitable.
Your student was a killer. He was attacking young Padawans.
He wasn't a good man.
I gave Callef too much responsibility too soon. His impatience for justice was his only failure.
Absolutely.
You are truly corrupt--but justice is coming.
Every so-called Jedi on Tython is going to die. That's a promise.
Your entire order is weak. You've done nothing to stop the Sith Empire's advances.
Don't give in to hatred, Bengel. Let us help you.
Your anger overwhelms you.
Help me become a coward like you? I'm the only true Jedi left in the galaxy.
Guess I missed the news about you winning the war.
And you have?
I can't defeat the Sith until the Jedi are strong again. You people diminish the Force by your very existence.
I'm going to wipe out the Sith. Just watch me.
I'm not weak.
Destroying evil requires purity. You are not pure.
Enjoy this little victory. It's your last.
